articles.author: Rob Picheta, Sebastian Shukla
articles.title: Russian airstrike hits busy shopping mall in central Ukraine, sparking fears of mass casualties
articles.description: A Russian airstrike struck a bustling shopping mall in Kremenchuk, central Ukraine on Monday, setting the building ablaze and prompting concerns of mass casualties.
articles.content:
A Russian airstrike struck a bustling shopping mall in Kremenchuk, central Ukraine on Monday, setting the building ablaze and prompting concerns of mass casualties.

articles.title: Opinion: The aftershocks of America's abortion earthquake will be felt for decades
articles.description: Following the US Supreme Court's decision to overturn Roe v. Wade, CNN Opinion asked a group of contributors to weigh in on the cultural, legal and political ramifications of this monumental legal opinion undoing nearly 50 years of federal abortion protection.

articles.author: Annie Grayer, CNN
articles.title: January 6 committee unexpectedly adds new hearing
articles.description: The committee investigating the Capitol Hill insurrection on January 6, 2021, has added a previously unexpected public hearing for Tuesday afternoon, the committee announced Monday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Toobin breaks down what Supreme Court opinion says about the right to religious freedom - CNN Video
articles.description: The Supreme Court said that a Washington state school district violated the First Amendment rights of a high school football coach when he lost his job after praying at the 50-yard line after games. CNN legal analyst Jeffrey Toobin discusses the court ruling …

articles.author: Christina Zdanowicz, CNN
articles.title: She was raped months after the 1973 Roe v. Wade ruling. She says a legal abortion saved her family
articles.description: Kollene Dunn's abortion a few months after the Supreme Court's 1973 Roe v. Wade ruling saved her family, she said.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: The remaining Supreme Court cases this term
articles.description: Although the Supreme Court issued the two most important opinions of the term last week, upending near 50-year-old precedent on abortion and expanding gun rights for the first time in a decade, this blockbuster term is not over.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue, CNN Supreme Court Reporter
articles.title: Supreme Court sides with doctors challenging their convictions in opioids 'pill mill' case
articles.description: The Supreme Court on Monday ruled in favor of two doctors who were convicted of prescribing dangerous opioids without valid medical justification in violation of federal law.

articles.author: Tierney Sneed and Ariane de Vogue, CNN
articles.title: Supreme Court rules school district cannot prohibit football coach's prayers on field
articles.description: The Supreme Court said Monday that a Washington state school district violated the First Amendment rights of a high school football coach when he lost his job for praying at the 50-yard line after games.

articles.author: Ariane de Vogue
articles.title: Supreme Court declines to revisit landmark First Amendment decision, leaving higher bar for libel in place
articles.description: The Supreme Court declined to revisit the landmark First Amendment decision in New York Times v. Sullivan. The 1964 ruling created a higher bar for public figures to claim libel and has been a bedrock of US media law.
